title: More Donation Options Added
body:
Sometimes I’m asked about receiving donations in crypto currencies not listed on my

Donations page
. Till now I had only four options: Bitcoin, Etherium, Monero and Dash. But since the cryptomarket is growing, more people have their savings distributed in many other coins and tokens.

That’s why today I’ve added 10 more options for those, who want to support me: Ripple (XRP), Tether USD, Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Litecoin (LTC), Stellar (XLM), ZCash (ZEC), Basic Attention Token (BAT), Chainlink Token (LINK), Crypto.com Coin (CRO) and Cardano (ADA).

I want to thank everyone who has been supporting me in the past through all these years, without you I couldn’t afford to keep this site and seedboxes running or that would cost me too much. Much love!

No obligations, of course, chip in only if you can afford it
